docs.lead_paragraph: A new kind of surgery for prostate cancer that freezes the tumor to destroy it may be just as effective as older treatments and carry a much lower risk of impotence or urinary incontinence. The procedure, described in a paper presented Friday in New Orleans at a conference of the Society of Interventional Radiology, attacks the tumor with a blast of argon gas -- a technology developed to cool the infrared detectors on missiles.
docs.abstract: Dr Gary Onik of Florida Hospital/Celebration Health leads study on new surgery that freezes prostate tumor with argon rather than removing gland; study, presented at Society of Interventional Radiology conference, suggests that procedure can arrest cancer without potential side effects that can occur after surgery removing prostate; drawing (S)
docs.snippet: A new kind of surgery for prostate cancer that freezes the tumor to destroy it may be just as effective as older treatments and carry a much lower risk of impotence or urinary incontinence.

docs.lead_paragraph: Obese shoppers routinely suffer rude and dismissive treatment at the hands of sales clerks. According to a study undertaken by graduate students at Rice University, sales clerks act unfriendly, neglect to smile, avoid eye contact and end interactions prematurely when dealing with overweight customers. The research was led by Eden King, a doctoral candidate in industrial and organizational psychology and will be presented in Los Angeles on April 15 at a meeting of the Society for Industrial and Organizational Psychology.
docs.abstract: Rice University graduate students conduct study on how obese shoppers are treated by sales clerks; study, which will be presented at Society for Industrial and Organizational Psychology meeting, finds obese people are treated more brusquely than individuals who are normal weight (S)
docs.snippet: According to a new study, obese shoppers routinely suffer rude and dismissive treatment at the hands of sales clerks.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: SOCIETY FOR INDUSTRIAL AND ORGANIZATIONAL PSYCHOLOGY
